# Interactive graph

```{r}
#creating the dataset for the interactive graph

emissions <- read.csv("emission_analysis.csv")

amazon_countries <- c("BRA", "PER", "BOL", "ECU", "COL", "VEN", "GUY", "SUR")

emissions_amazon <- emissions|> 
  filter(Country.Code %in% amazon_countries, Year >= 2000, Year <= 2020) |>
  select(Country.Code, Country.Name, Year, `Forest_Area`, `CO2_Emissions`)

emissions_amazon_scaled <- emissions_amazon |>
  group_by(Country.Code) |>
  mutate(
    Forest_Area = (Forest_Area - min(Forest_Area, na.rm = TRUE)) / 
                         (max(Forest_Area, na.rm = TRUE) - min(Forest_Area, na.rm = TRUE)),
    CO2_Emissions = (CO2_Emissions - min(CO2_Emissions, na.rm = TRUE)) / 
                           (max(CO2_Emissions, na.rm = TRUE) - min(CO2_Emissions, na.rm = TRUE))
  ) |>
  ungroup()

write.csv(emissions_amazon_scaled, "co2_forest.csv")

```
